customerService.title: Customer Service
customerService.subtitle: We're here to help. Find answers to common questions and learn about our policies.
customerService.helpDesc: Check our FAQ, shipping info, and policies.
customerService.faq1Q: How do I track my order?
customerService.faq1A: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking number. You can use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier's site.
customerService.faq2Q: What payment methods do you accept?
customerService.faq2A: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All transactions are secured with SSL encryption.
customerService.faq3Q: Can I modify or cancel my order?
customerService.faq3A: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 1 hour of placement. After that, the order enters processing and cannot be changed. Please contact us immediately if you need assistance.
customerService.faq4A: Yes! We ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location. Check our shipping calculator at checkout for exact costs.
customerService.faq5Q: How do I contact customer support?
customerService.faq5A: You can reach us via email at support@holafushion.com, through our Instagram DM @belalwaheed_, or by phone at +1 (555) 123-4567. We respond within 24 hours.
customerService.shipping1: Free standard shipping on orders over $50
customerService.returns1: 30-day return window for unused items in original packaging
customerService.returns2: Free returns on all domestic orders
customerService.returns3: Refunds processed within 5-7 business days after receipt
customerService.termsIntro: By using our website and services, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
customerService.terms1Text: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
customerService.terms2Text: All orders are subject to availability. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order. Prices are subject to change without notice.
customerService.terms3Text: All content on this website, including images, text, and logos, is the property of Hola Fushion and protected by copyright laws.
customerService.privacyIntro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
customerService.privacy1Text: We collect information you provide directly, such as name, email, shipping address, and payment details when you make a purchase or create an account.
customerService.privacy2Text: We use your information to process orders, communicate with you, improve our services, and send promotional offers (with your consent).
customerService.privacy3Text: We implement industry-standard security measures including SSL encryption, secure payment processing, and regular security audits to protect your data.
